channel.title: Chaotic maul animation delta rsps need help
channel.description: hello moparians, i need help on my delta rsps (already added chaotic maul models succesfully) anyways i added the chaotic maul etc but ingame it hits like a granite maul not like a c maul it hits from the side i mean... how do i change it to hit correctley the animation and answers would be helpful! if you didnt understand this question tell me and ill try to reword it bye!
